# Culture Complex station__disambig_1

| image         = Gwangju-metro-104-Culture-complex-station-platform-20190521-082300.jpg

Culture Complex () is an underground station of the Gwangju Metro Line 1 in Gwangsan-dong, Dong District, Gwangju, South Korea.
Station Layout
{|table border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=3
|-

|-
|style="border-bottom:solid 0 gray;" width=50 valign=top|L1
|style="border-bottom:solid 0 gray;" width=100 valign=top|Concourse
|style="border-bottom:solid 0 gray;" width=500 valign=top|Faregates, Ticketing Machines, Station Control
|-

|style="border-top:solid 1px gray;"|Southbound
|style="border-top:solid 1px gray;"|← Line 1 toward Nokdong (Namgwangju)
|-
|style="border-top:solid 2px black;border-right:solid 2px black;border-left:solid 2px black;border-bottom:solid 2px black;text-align:center;" colspan=2|Island platform, doors will open on the left

|style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray;"|→ Line 1 toward Pyeongdong (Geumnamno 4(sa)-ga) →
